original_title: Sri Lanka bonds opens steady, rupee 323.00/325.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds opened steady, dealers said while the spot US dollar opened at 324.00/325.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted steady at 15.90/16.00 percent after closing at 15.90/95 percent on Wednesday.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 was quoted steady at 15.10/15 percent after closing at 15.10/20 percent on Wednesday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted unchanged at 13.25/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 and 01.07.2025 have not been quoted. (Colombo/July19/2023)
